tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE environmental_permits (
    permit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    applicant_name VARCHAR(100),
    application_date DATE,
    approval_status VARCHAR(50),
    permit_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE permit_approvals (
  approval_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  application_id UUID REFERENCES environmental_permit_applications(application_id),
  approval_date DATE,
  approved_by TEXT,
  approval_status TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_permit_applications (
    application_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    applicant_name VARCHAR(100),
    application_date DATE,
    application_type VARCHAR(50),
    approval_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE permit_approval (
    approval_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    application_id INT REFERENCES environmental_permit_applications(application_id),
    approval_date DATE,
    issued_by VARCHAR(100),
    approval_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE permit_approvals (
    approval_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    application_id INT,
    approval_date DATE,
    approved_by VARCHAR(50),
    CONSTRAINT fk_application_id FOREIGN KEY (application_id) REFERENCES permit_applications(application_id)
);

CREATE TABLE permit_status (
    status_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    application_id INT,
    approval_id INT,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    CONSTRAINT fk_application_id FOREIGN KEY (application_id) REFERENCES permit_applications(application_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_approval_id FOREIGN KEY (approval_id) REFERENCES permit_approvals(approval_id)
);
